comment_body:
Why do you even love It? He's a scary clown that kidnaps children bro.

Stupid unfunny joke about IT aside, nice story. There's satisfaction that I get everytime I read this kinds of story.  Written well, and have scary in there too. Good job and nice story!

I do wonder, your previous story shares kinda the same plot too, where the narrator is giving out pain to the person that gave them those pain before, so it's kind of cool to be consistent with the idea but making it fresh too!
